channel.title: Make their be xp in certain skill after killing npc and lvl to kill-solved
channel.description:
[317]So I want their to be, when u kill a certain npc you get xp in farming. I know its weird but thats not the point.
so their will be 5 different npc's with different farming levels needed and different xp gained. /and this is after you kill the npc you have gained 100xp total from killing it and all npcs will have 100hp
1=level 1 farming needed=100xp 2=level25 farming needed=250xp 3=level50 farming needed=500xp 4=level70 farming needed=700xp 5=level90 farming needed=1500xp
any help?

item.title: Make their be xp in certain skill after killing npc and lvl to kill-solved
item.dc:creator: @_ZeroScape `ZeroScape
item.description:
@_ZeroScape wrote:

[quote=“Project Evolution, post:5, topic:340239”][quote author=`ZeroScape link=topic=436607.msg3207945#msg3207945 date=1273972662]
@Project Evolution: I’m waiting for him to say something like:

  1. 0mg! 1 d1d wh4t y0u s41d 4nd 1 c0mpil3 4nd 1t s41s playerName is n0t decl4r3d.
  2. 0hhh… Why 4int addSkillXP(amount, skill) w0rking? sais method is not found! itz in da client.java man!
    [/quote]
    Too late, I already got the PM.
    But I guess I wont mind taking a bit of time to help. :rolleyes:[/quote]

The “Too late, I already got the PM. ;)” part made me cry, or laught. Not quite sure, maybe a mix.

Read full topic

item.source: Make their be xp in certain skill after killing npc and lvl to kill-solved

item.title: Make their be xp in certain skill after killing npc and lvl to kill-solved
item.dc:creator: @Project_Evolution Project Evolution
item.description:
@Project_Evolution wrote:

So your saying when you kill te farmers you get farming xp, correct? If so, just head into NPCHandler and find,

npcs[i].animNumber = 0x900; // human dead

Scroll down a bit and you will see if statements similar to,

if (npcs[i].npcType ==

with an NPC ID following the == (equality operator). Simply add another if statement like so,

if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCID && temp.taskID == NPCID) { // Add things here }

When you kill the NPC that you put in the if statement, this if statement handles what happens. So if you were to want them to give a message or add farmer xp, that would do the trick.

Read full topic
item.source: Make their be xp in certain skill after killing npc and lvl to kill-solved

item.title: Make their be xp in certain skill after killing npc and lvl to kill-solved
item.dc:creator: @_ZeroScape `ZeroScape
item.description:
@_ZeroScape wrote:

Could you please try to explain it better?

so their will be 5 different npc’s with different farming levels needed and different xp gained. /and this is after you kill the npc you have gained 100xp total from killing it and all npcs will have 100hp

I believe that sentence is trying to tell me something you want me to do, but I can’t understand the way you put it.

I can help, if you re-write that sentence.

Edit: Please give me the NPC Id’s too

Read full topic
